Uses of Interface
com.poesys.db.dao.IDaoManager

  • Packages that use IDaoManager 
    Package Description
    com.poesys.db.dao  

    • Uses of IDaoManager in com.poesys.db.dao

      Classes in com.poesys.db.dao that implement IDaoManager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CacheDaoManager
      A singleton object that manages data access objects in the system.
      class  DirectDaoManager
      A singleton object that manages data access objects in the system with no caching, implying direct access to a persistent store for all data access.
      class  MemcachedDaoManager
      A singleton object that manages data access objects in the system.
      class  MessagingDaoManager
      A singleton object that manages data access objects in the system.
      Fields in com.poesys.db.dao declared as IDaoManager 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static IDaoManager MemcachedDaoManager.cacheManager
      Singleton in-memory cache manager instance
      private static IDaoManager DirectDaoManager.manager 
      private static IDaoManager MemcachedDaoManager.manager
      Singleton manager instance
      Fields in com.poesys.db.dao with type parameters of type IDaoManager 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IDaoManager> DaoManagerFactory.managers
      The singleton manager
      Methods in com.poesys.db.dao that return IDaoManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IDaoManager CacheDaoManager.getInstance()
      Get the DAO Manager singleton implementing a map cache.
      static IDaoManager MessagingDaoManager.getInstance()
      Get the manager instance.
      static IDaoManager DirectDaoManager.getInstance()
      Get the singleton DAO Manager implemented with no caching
      static IDaoManager MemcachedDaoManager.getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of the IDaoManager for a memcached cache.
      static IDaoManager DaoManagerFactory.getManager(java.lang.String subsystem)
      Get the manager, defaulting to initializing a cache-map manager if no manager yet exists.
      static IDaoManager DaoManagerFactory.initCacheManager(java.lang.String subsystem)
      Initialize a cache-map DAO manager.
      static IDaoManager DaoManagerFactory.initDirectManager(java.lang.String subsystem)
      Initialize a direct-data-access DAO manager.
      static IDaoManager DaoManagerFactory.initMemcachedManager(java.lang.String subsystem)
      Initialize a memcached DAO manager.
      static IDaoManager DaoManagerFactory.initMessagingManager(java.lang.String subsystem)
      Initialize a messaging, cache-map DAO manager.
